meanings.definition: Not willing to divulge information or cooperate
meanings.sent1: The suspect remained unforthcoming during the interrogation.
meanings.sent2: Her unforthcoming attitude made it difficult to work together on the project.
meanings.sent3: The unforthcoming cat refused to reveal where it hid the toy mouse.
meanings.sent4: The unforthcoming clouds kept their secrets hidden behind a veil of gray.
meanings.sent5: The unforthcoming fortress guarded its mysteries with silent walls.

meanings.definition: Not coming forward or appearing readily
meanings.sent1: The unforthcoming response from the audience puzzled the speaker.
meanings.sent2: His unforthcoming behavior at the party made him seem aloof.
meanings.sent3: The unforthcoming flower waited until the last moment to bloom.
meanings.sent4: The unforthcoming river meandered slowly through the valley, revealing its beauty gradually.
meanings.sent5: The unforthcoming stars only appeared in the night sky after the clouds dispersed.
